full_summary:
### Title
Traffic Control Services – Waterton Lakes National Park, Alberta

### Reference Information
- **Title**: Traffic Control Services - Waterton Lakes National Park, AB
- **Government PVC Reference Number**: PW-23-01024569
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: 5P420-22-0185/A
- **Publication Date**: February 2, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 6, 2023 16:00:00
- **Contract Period**: To be determined

### Summary
Parks Canada is seeking a contractor to provide traffic control services with trained flag persons at various locations within Waterton Lakes National Park, Alberta.

### Key Details
- **Period of Contract**: The anticipated contract period is one (1) year with additional one (1) year option periods up to March 31, 2028.
- **Notice and Submissions**: The successful bidder must submit their response via email to soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca and/or fax to 1-866-246-6893. 
- **Option Periods**: Four (4) one (1) year option periods are available. 
- **Enquiries**: All technical and contractual enquiries must be submitted to the Contracting Authority.

### Mandatory Requirements
- Compliance with the National Park Act, including ordinances, laws, and regulations.

### Language
Both English and French documents are available, and responses will be accepted in either language.

### Additional Information
- This solicitation is in accordance with the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, among others.
- Late submissions will not be considered.
- Bidders are responsible for downloading and printing the solicitation documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

### Contact Information
Contracting Authority:
Nguyen, Daniel
daniel.nguyen@pc.gc.ca
403-836-2352
220 - 4 Avenue S.E., Suite 720, Calgary, AB T2G 4X3, Canada
[FAX: 1-866-246-6893, Email: soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca] (1)岚[…]canvasrg}@pcgcc\.ca
